org.xlattice.crypto

Class Key64Coder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.crypto.Key64Coder

  • public class Key64Coder
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods for base64 encoding and decoding public key values.
    Author:
    < A HREF="mailto:jddixon@users.sourceforge.net">Jim Dixon

    • Method Detail

      • prefixEncodeAndFold

        public static java.lang.String prefixEncodeAndFold(java.lang.String prefix,
                                   byte[] b,
                                   int i)
        Construct a line consisting of a prefix, followed by a space, followed by a base64-encoded binary value, followed by a space, followed by a positive integer value. If the resulting String is longer than LINE_LENGTH characters, a line break is inserted and the next line is indented by a single space. The integer value must not exceed 1 million, a completely arbitrary restriction. XXX This implementation is not efficient -- AND IT'S TOO FIDDLY; XXX MODIFY TO NOT TREAT EXPONENT DIFFERENTLY. That is, just XXX wrap at 76 characters, disregarding exact location of e.
        Parameters:
        prefix - alphanumeric value (algorithm name)
        b - binary value to be encoded
        i - positive integer value, less than one million

      • encodeRSAPublicKey

        public static java.lang.String encodeRSAPublicKey(RSAPublicKey k)
                                           throws org.xlattice.CryptoException
        Base64-encode an RSAPublicKey. The representation of the modulus is big-endian. The public exponent is silently converted to an int, a narrowing conversion which possibly loses precision and changes the sign of the exponent. The String returned looks like "rsa NNN...N E" where NNN..N represents the base64-encoded modulus and E the exponent in decimal form. Spaces separate "rsa" and the two numeric values. If the number of printing characters in any line would exceed LINE_LENGTH, a CR-LF-SPACE sequence is inserted.
        Throws:
        org.xlattice.CryptoException

      • decodeRSAPublicKey

        public static RSAPublicKey decodeRSAPublicKey(java.lang.String s)
                                       throws org.xlattice.CryptoException
        Decode a base64-encoded RSAPublicKey. The key has been encoded as described above, "rsa NNN...N E", with line lengths kept to LINE_LENGTH by inserting CR-LF-SPACE sequences and the entire String CR-LF terminated.
        Throws:
        org.xlattice.CryptoException
